paper_title.en: Dielectric relaxation measurement of cementitious laminated materials simulating diagnosis of prestressed concrete structures
paper_title.ja: プレストレストコンクリートの劣化診断を指向したセメント系積層材料の電気化学的特性の周波数依存性に関する基礎的検討

description.en: In this research, dielectric relaxation measurements which relate to measurement repeatability, a variety of the electrodes, applied voltage magnitude, and materials configuration of specimens were conducted to grasp the dielectric behavior of multilayer cementitious materials which simulate prestressed concrete and results were obtained as below: 1. Conductance requires close attention about its repeatability. 2. A variety of the electrodes and applied voltage magnitude have influences on the characteristics of lower frequency behavior of capacitance and conductance. 3. Behaviors of polarization charges reflect the specimen configuration and shape.
description.ja: In this research, dielectric relaxation measurements which relate to measurement repeatability, a variety of the electrodes, applied voltage magnitude, and materials configuration of specimens were conducted to grasp the dielectric behavior of multilayer cementitious materials which simulate prestressed concrete and results were obtained as below: 1. Conductance requires close attention about its repeatability. 2. A variety of the electrodes and applied voltage magnitude have influences on the characteristics of lower frequency behavior of capacitance and conductance. 3. Behaviors of polarization charges reflect the specimen configuration and shape.

research_project_title.ja: 鉄筋コンクリート施工標準の性能規定型建築基準への対応に関する研究
research_project_title.en: Study on Performance-based Construction Standard for Reinforced Concrete Works in compliance with Performance-based Building Standard

offer_organization.en: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science

description.ja:
本研究は、阪神・淡路大震災を契機とした建築物のより合理的な安全性の確保および規制緩和・国際協調の推進という時代要請に応えるために、建築基準体系を仕様規定から性能規定へ移行させる方向で検討がなされている中で、性能規定型建築基準に対応した鉄筋コンクリート工事施工標準のあり方、規定の方法、規定の内容などについて検討を行ったものである。実験的研究、解析的研究および研究者間の議論を通じて以下のような成果を得た。
1)性能規定型建築基準・性能設計に対応した、国際的にも普遍性をもつ合理的な鉄筋コンクリート施工標準のあり方・方向性を明らかにした上で、性能項目およびその表示方法・評価方法について考察を加え、可能なものについて提案を行った。
b)性能規定型建築基準を実際に活用するために、施工標準では承認基準を明確にすることが必要である。そのために鉄筋コンクリート工事施工標準において、設計上要求される多様な性能水準レベルと様々な材料・工事仕様との関係、および様々な環境境条件のもとで、様々な施工手段を用いて建設される実際の鉄筋コンクリート構造体の性能に及ぼすこれらの工事環境要因・施工手段要因の影響を、性能という概念の元に整理し、定量的に表現できる体系について考察した。
c)ヨーロッパにおいて、各国の建築コード、施工標準をハーモナイズした建築基準であるENスタンダードをCENが作成しているが、鉄筋コンクリートに関するEN規格の動向およびそれを基礎にしたISOスタンダードの動向を、現地に赴き、各国のキーパーソンに会って聴取し、調査した。
d)現状では、工学的に定量的な性能基準を確立することが困難な性能項目、および性能水準の検証方法が確定されていない性能項目について、性能規定化に対応するための工学的知見の蓄積を実験および理論を通じて行った。
description.en:
As a result of the Great Hanshin-Awaji Earthquake, it has become necessary to secure further the safety of architecture while promoting deregulation and international cooperation. To this end, the architectural standard system is now under examination regarding its change from that of a specification-based to performance-based system. Under such circumstances, this study was carried out to examine; what the ‘construction standards for reinforced concrete works' should be in order to comply with ‘performance-based building standards', together with its stipulation methods and contents. The following results were obtained through experimental and analytical studies, as well as discussions among researchers concerned.
a)Following clarification of what a universal and rational ‘construction standard for reinforced concrete works' which complies with the ‘performance-based building standard/performance-based design' should be, as well as its direction, proposals were made when deemed feasible concerning the performance items and methods of indication/evaluation.
b)It is necessary to clarify the compliance criteria with respect to construction standards, regarding the actual application of the ‘performance-based building standard'. A system which can be expressed quantitatively was investigated by reorganizing with the performance-based concept ; the relationship between various performance levels required for design and various specifications for materials and construction in terms of the ‘construction standard for reinforced concrete works', as well as the effects of factors such as construction environment and methods upon the actual performance of reinforced concrete structural members which are built under differing environmental conditions by various construction methods.
c)In Europe, CEN is preparing the EN standard by harmonizing the building codes and construction standards of each country. A survey was carried out concerning trends regarding the EN Standard for reinforced concrete and ISO Standard which is based on the EN Standard, by visiting and interviewing key persons of each country.
d)With respect to the performance items for which engineering quantitative standards are difficult to establish under the present conditions, and those for which a verification method for the performance level has not been established, accumulation of engineering knowledge was gained through experiment and theory, in order to comply with the stipulation of performances.
